title: Toggl Weekly Report
description:
# How To Use This Function

1. Add two secrets: Toggl Key and Toggl Workspace
2. Add Slack Integration
3. Have fun

# Result
All Projects Weekly total: ~ 43 h, 46 min

Project: Project Name, Client
Weekly Total: 10 h, 15 min

Project: Project Name, Client
Weekly Total: 23 h, 31 min

# Commands

`/blockspring toggl-weekly`
Weekly Summary

`/blockspring toggl-w-projects <project_ids>`
Get weekly summary of your projects. Comma separated list of projects to only show the specified projects


## Code

[GitHub](https://github.com/CivicVision/Slackbots/tree/master/toggl-weekly)
